scripts.bootstrap: npx lerna bootstrap && npm run stub-dev-deployments && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run kill-ports && REACT_APP_HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet npx lerna run start --parallel
scripts.start:no-gasless: npm run kill-ports && REACT_APP_DISABLE_GASLESS=true REACT_APP_HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet npx lerna run start --parallel
scripts.start:local: npm run kill-ports && REACT_APP_HARDHAT_FORK= HARDHAT_FORK= npx lerna run start --parallel
scripts.start:local:liquidity-mining: npx lerna run generate-merkle-root:local && MERKLE_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/merkleDistributor/merkleDistributorInfo.dev.json MERKLE_DIRECT_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/merkleDirectDistributor/merkleDirectDistributorInfo.dev.json REACT_APP_TOGGLE_REWARDS=true npm run start:local
scripts.start:murmuration: npm run kill-ports && npx lerna run start:murmuration --parallel
scripts.start:murmuration:liquidity-mining: npm run kill-ports && npx lerna run generate-merkle-root:murmuration && MERKLE_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/merkleDistributor/merkleDistributorInfo.dev.json MERKLE_DIRECT_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/merkleDirectDistributor/merkleDirectDistributorInfo.dev.json npx lerna run start:murmuration:liquidity-mining --parallel
scripts.kill-ports: for i in 4000 4001 3000 5001 8545 8080; do lsof -t -i:$i | xargs -r kill; done
